column1: Kenya election 2017: President Kenyatta urges peaceful vote
column4: Uhuru Kenyatta appeals for calm as he faces rival Raila Odinga in Tuesday's general election.

column1: 'Dodgy' greenhouse gas data threatens Paris accord
column4: There are huge uncertainties in greenhouse gas totals due to inaccurate data, the BBC finds.

column1: Venezuela: Hackers target Venezuelan government sites
column4: Messages appeared to support armed men who attacked a military base, and decried the "dictatorship".

column1: Fleeing Trump: Couple leaving the Carolinas for Canada
column4: Many anti-Trump Americans talked about leaving the US for Canada. This couple is actually doing it.

column1: Driver crawls across ladder in Texas floods
column4: Firefighters in Texas extend a ladder to a stranded driver as the floodwaters wreak havoc below.
The man is the 1,641st victim to be identified, out of the 2,753 people who died in the attack.

column1: Four men who negotiate with IS
column4: Four men are negotiating with Islamic State over the release of Yazidi women

column1: Colorado bear drives car after getting stuck inside
column4: Bears commonly trap themselves in vehicles in Colorado, but rarely crash the car in the process.

column1: Toronto police officer buys shoplifter suit he tried to steal
column4: The 18-year-old said he had stolen the shirt and tie from Walmart for a job interview outfit.

column1: North Korea vows to retaliate against US over sanctions
column4: Pyongyang threatens the US for drafting fresh sanctions that were approved by the UN on Saturday.
